name: Ourobor-Bus
description:
An infinite runner game about a bus. Pick up pedestrians to ascend to heaven, or hit them and be banished to the depths of hell!

Made for CMPM/ARTG 120 spring 2021 at UCSC. Made with javascript in Phaser 3.

Credits
Programming: Jared Nolen, Nathann Latimore, Benjamin Urlik

Art: Danielle Kraljevski

Music: Jared Nolen
